title: Freewheeling Podcast: What the new WWT teams mean for women’s cycling
content:
Freewheeling Podcast: What the new WWT teams mean for women's cycling

Abby, Loren, and Amy chat about the Val di Sole cyclocross World Cup and cyclocross potentially becoming an Olympic sport. 

The UCI announced the new WorldTour teams and the podcast speculates what that means for the future of the sport.

author: Abby Mickey
